live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
50306.summary: Some customers in the Northeast Crescent Heights area of Lethbridge are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
50306.title: Jun 5 - Lethbridge (Northeast Crescent Heights) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
